title: 4 Bedrooms Luxury Upstair House for Sale in Kurunegala Town
details:
House is located in serene area of Kurunegala town
400m to Maliyadeva girls college.
1.5 km to Maliyadeva boys college
750m to Lyceum International college.
very close proximity to Supermarkets. Hospitals,Bus stops, Pharmacies and all the other facilities.
Rolar gate, house surrounded by wall
Decent naibouors
Living room
4 Spacious bed rooms,2 rooms are AC
Fully Tiled.
Main line and well water
Servant room and toilet
